front: Was machst du in deiner Freizeit?
back: What do you do in your free time?
We play tennis on the weekend.
Do you have a favourite hobby?

front: Wie oft gehst du ins Fitnessstudio?
back: How often do you go to the gym?
I listen to music while relaxing.
Who do you play basketball with?

front: Ich spiele Videospiele in meiner Freizeit.
back: I play video games in my free time.

front: Wie lange spielst du schon Tennis?
back: How long have you been playing tennis?
Do you have a favourite book?

front: Mit wem gehst du ins Kino?
back: Who do you go to the cinema with?
I listen to podcasts while relaxing.
Which music do you like to listen to?

front: Ich mache oft Spaziergänge im Park.
back: I often go for walks in the park.

front: Wie viele Stunden pro Woche trainierst du?
back: How many hours a week do you train?
I like writing in my journal.
Do you have a favourite sports team?

front: Welche Freizeitaktivitäten machst du am Wochenende?
back: Which leisure activities do you do on the weekend?
How often do you go hiking?
Who do you play volleyball with?
I like going to the theater.

front: Welche Hobbys hast du früher gehabt?
back: Which hobbies did you have before?
I like listening to classical music.

front: Wir treffen uns, um zusammen zu spielen.
Wie lange spielst du schon Basketball?
back: How long have you been playing basketball?
